name: TAXI-RUSH!
description:
Race through the taxis before rush hour really hits!  Why?  FOR THE THRILL OF IT!

WASD to move

Go back and forth between red lines to earn points

Click on the H in highscore to reset your highscore

Future Plans -

Endless, no more needing to go back

Option for different colored cars

Longer Music

Disco-mode when going diagonal

I appreciate any feedback on what I can improve!
